Part 1 
• Who do you usually prefer to study with? • Do you have a lot in common with your friends? Can you give some examples? • Who do you prefer to socialise with? • Do you ever become angry or are you quite a calm person? 
Part 2 Describe a person you have worked with who you admire. You should say • Who this person is and how you know them • What type of work this person does • What this person has done that you admire And explain why you admire this person so much. 

Part 3 • What type of qualities do good leaders have? • What personal qualities do you think parents should teach their children? How might they do that? • Do you think that people can learn to be more adventurous? • Do you think it's important for business leaders to be hardworking?
